properties.name: my.tst.closeBrowser
properties.description: Close chrome at the end of test.

properties.name: my.tst.monkeyTest.seeds
properties.description: Seeds for MonkeyTest round #0, if it needed. Or 0.

properties.name: my.tst.monkeyTest.rounds
properties.description: How many rounds Monkey Test must pass.

properties.name: my.tst.monkeyTest.steps
properties.description: How many steps in a round.

properties.name: my.tst.monkey.failImmediately
properties.description: Whether to stop Monkey Test on first fault.

properties.name: my.mindsPageSize
properties.description: Page size for paginator in minds list.

properties.name: my.messagesPageSize
properties.description: Page size for paginator in messages list.

properties.name: my.paginatorMaxSize
properties.description: Max width of paginator before we start to boil it down.

properties.name: my.paginatorWide
properties.description: How many prev and next page buttons should be shown for boiled paginator.

properties.name: my.time2RetryUseRedis
properties.description: Time in millis when retry to use Redis.

properties.name: my.tst.monkey.feignDB.enabled
properties.description: before every round fill DB with feign data.

properties.name: my.tst.monkey.feignDB.friendships
properties.description: Max number of friends per user.

properties.name: my.tst.strict
properties.description: Strict check: Compare times of minds and answers.
